vignette.name: _Jamoma_vignette_template
vignette.p:
object names links are created using an o tag. ie. j.model is used to declare a subpatcher as a model in Jamoma namespace.
object attributes links are created using an at tag. ie. j.model amenities attribute is used to filter out uneeded features.
object messages links are created using an m tag. ie. j.model preset:new message is used to create a new preset.
patchers are linked from a doc page using the openfilelink tag. ie. See input~ model patcher to see how to use j.in~ and j.out~ features.
images are linked using the img tag. Images must be stored in the relative images folder.

bluebox.p: ie. You can instantiate a model in your main patcher just like any regular Max abstraction

ul.li: Press n key to create an object
Start typing your model name and select it from the autocompletion list
